What has Uruguay done to be competitive in agriculture?	Labeling as "Natural" or "Ecological"
What has Uruguay done to be competitive in agriculture?	Use low inputs of labour, technology, and capital, which results in lower yields but also opens the door for Uruguay to market its products as "natural" or "ecological"
